Spain: Spain during this time opened up the slave trade to Havana.
Germany: French Revolution: The Third Estate of the French Estates General declared itself the National Assembly.
France: The French Revolution began with the storming of the Bastille.
Colombia: José Manuel de Ezpeleta is Viceroy of New Granada
Chile: Start of the French Revolution, which affected Europe and the Americas with its ideas.
Belgium: Army of émigré volunteers invades the Austrian Netherlands. Manifesto of the People of Brabant published. Government forces defeated in Battle of Turnhout (1789).
